amendment.description: To protect the Medicare and Medicaid programs.

action.text: Amendment SA 20 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive section 305(b)(2) of the CBA with respect to amendment SA 20 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 47. Record Vote Number: 4.
Point of order that the amendment violates section 305(b)(2) of the CBA raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 20.
Amendment SA 20 proposed by Senator Sanders for Senator Hirono.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive section 305(b)(2) of the CBA with respect to amendment SA 20 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 47. Record Vote Number: 4.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 20 proposed by Senator Sanders for Senator Hirono.
